content:
PE_OF_DOCUMENT` = “A“
then “Alien Resident Number“
  • when `xcrew.TRAVEL_DOCUMENT.TYPE_OF_DOCUMENT` = “I“
    then “Identity Card“
  • when `xcrew.TRAVEL_DOCUMENT.TYPE_OF_DOCUMENT` = “D“
    then “Driver license“
  • when `xcrew.TRAVEL_DOCUMENT.TYPE_OF_DOCUMENT` <> (“P“ or “A“ or “I“ or “D“)
    then “Other“

    • **Licence:** The field is set to "LICENCE" in the query.| |subtype|**Licence:** `xcrew.LICENCE`|**Licence:** `TYPE`| | |docNo|**Documents:** `xcrew.TRAVEL_DOCUMENT`
    **Licence:** `xcrew.LICENCE`|**Documents:** `TRAVEL_DOC_NO`
    **Licence:** `LICENCE_NUMBER`| | |refDocNo| | |N/A in the source system.| |issuedAt|**Documents:** `xcrew.TRAVEL_DOCUMENT`|**Documents:** `ISSUE_DT`| | |startDate|**Documents:** `xcrew.TRAVEL_DOCUMENT`|**Documents:** `ISSUE_DT`| | |endDate|**Documents:** `xcrew.TRAVEL_DOCUMENT`|**Documents:** `EXPIRY_DT`| | |issuer|**Documents:** `xcrew.TRAVEL_DOCUMENT td`,
    `SCHEDOPS.COUNTRY c`
    **Licence:** `xcrew.LICENCE l`,
    `SCHEDOPS.COUNTRY c` |**Documents:** `td.ISSUE_COUNTRY`,
    `td.ISSUE_PLACE`, `c.CODE`, `c.NAME`
    **Licence:** `l.ISSUE_COUNTRY`,
    `c.CODE`, `c.NAME`|**Documents:**
    • when `td.ISSUE_COUNTRY` = “TR”
      then `td.ISSUE_PLACE`
    • when `td.ISSUE_COUNTRY` = “TR” and `td.ISSUE_COUNTRY` = `c.CODE`
      then `c.NAME`

    **Licence:** when `l.ISSUE_COUNTRY` = `c.CODE` then `c.NAME`| # Crew Base Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope * All date #### - Source Query * `Riverx_CrewBase_Query` #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps * Every day at 03:00 (UTC) #### - Change Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: A composite key, combining `xcrew.CRM_HOME_BASE.TLC` and `xcrew.CRM_HOME_BASE.VALID_SINCE_DT` fields(see Mapping for details). * Delete operation can not be performed because of the lack of status in the source system data. ### Mappi
